LanguageData.ReviaRaceConsecrateBloodRune.label: Consecrate Blood Rune
LanguageData.ReviaRaceConsecrateBloodRune.description: Consecrate a Blood Rune in the name of Skarne, the bloody god.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceCraftBloodRune.label: Craft Blood Rune
LanguageData.ReviaRaceBloodstoneToPalestone.label: Convert bloodstones to palestones
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeElephantTusk.label: sacrifice elephant tusk
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeElephantTusk.descripti: Sacrifice an elephant tusk to honour the bloody gods of the Revian pantheon.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceConsecrateBloodRuneGreater.desc: Consecrate a Greater Blood Rune in the name of Skarne, the bloody god.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceCraftGreaterBloodRune.label: Craft Greater Blood Rune
LanguageData.ReviaRaceCraftGreaterBloodRune.descripti: Craft an inert Greater Blood Rune.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeCorpse.label: sacrifice humanlike
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeCorpse.description: Sacrifice a humanlike corpse to honour the bloody gods of the Revian pantheon.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceConsecrateBloodRuneLesser.label: Consecrate Lesser Blood Rune
LanguageData.ReviaRaceConsecrateBloodRuneLesser.descr: Consecrate a Lesser Blood Rune in the name of Skarne, the bloody god.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceCraftLesserBloodRune.label: Craft Lesser Blood Rune
LanguageData.ReviaRaceCraftLesserBloodRune.descriptio: Craft an inert Lesser Blood Rune.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeRawMeat.label: sacrifice raw meat
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeRawMeat.description: Sacrifice some raw meat to honour the bloody gods of the Revian pantheon.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeThrumboHorn.label: sacrifice thrumbo horn
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeThrumboHorn.descriptio: Sacrifice a thrumbo horn to honour the bloody gods of the Revian pantheon.
